description: Creates a campaign for the specified Amazon Connect account. This API is idempotent.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of an Amazon Connect Campaign name.

parameters.name: dialerConfig
parameters.description: The possible types of dialer config parameters progressiveDialerConfig (dict) --- Progressive Dialer config The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource. dialingCapacity (float) --- Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns predictiveDialerConfig (dict) --- Predictive Dialer config The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource. dialingCapacity (float) --- Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns agentlessDialerConfig (dict) --- Agentless Dialer config dialingCapacity (float) --- Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

nested_params.name: bandwidthAllocation
nested_params.description: The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource.

nested_params.name: dialingCapacity
nested_params.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

nested_params.name: bandwidthAllocation
nested_params.description: The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource.

nested_params.name: dialingCapacity
nested_params.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

nested_params.name: dialingCapacity
nested_params.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

parameters.name: outboundCallConfig
parameters.description: The configuration used for outbound calls. The identifier of the contact flow for the outbound call. connectSourcePhoneNumber (string) --- The phone number associated with the Amazon Connect instance, in E.164 format. If you do not specify a source phone number, you must specify a queue. connectQueueId (string) --- The queue for the call. If you specify a queue, the phone displayed for caller ID is the phone number specified in the queue. If you do not specify a queue, the queue defined in the contact flow is used. If you do not specify a queue, you must specify a source phone number. answerMachineDetectionConfig (dict) --- Answering Machine Detection config Enable or disable answering machine detection awaitAnswerMachinePrompt (boolean) --- Enable or disable await answer machine prompt.

nested_params.name: connectContactFlowId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the contact flow for the outbound call.

nested_params.name: connectSourcePhoneNumber
nested_params.description: The phone number associated with the Amazon Connect instance, in E.164 format. If you do not specify a source phone number, you must specify a queue.

nested_params.name: connectQueueId
nested_params.description: The queue for the call. If you specify a queue, the phone displayed for caller ID is the phone number specified in the queue. If you do not specify a queue, the queue defined in the contact flow is used. If you do not specify a queue, you must specify a source phone number.

nested_params.name: enableAnswerMachineDetection
nested_params.description: Enable or disable answering machine detection.

nested_params.name: awaitAnswerMachinePrompt
nested_params.description: Enable or disable await answer machine prompt.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tag map with key and value. (string) --- Tag key. (string) --- Tag value.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The resource name of an Amazon Connect campaign.
